snippet.title: THUG Pro review for PC
snippet.description:
This is a great game! You should give it a try if you can.

Unofficial THUG Pro website: http://thpsx.com/

Note about connection issues: "Connection problems are usually port related (either you or the host you were trying to join). Just like the old days, port 5153 is the default port that should be open in your firewall." - @sk8ace

From the website: "THUGPro is a mod-extension to Tony Hawk's Underground 2. The developers are Morten, Quazz, and Gone. The intention of this mod is to unify the community by adding levels and features from other THPS games to one central place. The project first released on August 10th, 2013 and is currently still on-going."

THUG 2 Focus blur bug patch: http://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/108-tony-hawks-underground-2-blur-bug-fix/

THUG 2 widescreen patch: https://thirteenag.github.io/wfp#thug2

--

"Secrets of the Schoolyard" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ 

"Pamgaea" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) 
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
